00039 Component::Component(QDomDocument &doc): 
00040 LibraryComponent(doc),
00041 busInterfaces_(), 
00042 channels_(), 
00043 remapStates_(), 
00044 addressSpaces_(),
00045 memoryMaps_(),
00046 model_(), 
00047 compGenerators_(), 
00048 choices_(), 
00049 fileSets_(),
00050 cpus_(),
00051 otherClockDrivers_(),
00052 parameters_(), 
00053 attributes_() {
00054 
00055         LibraryComponent::vlnv_->setType(VLNV::COMPONENT);
00056 
00057         // find the IP-Xact root element (spirit:component or spirit:design ...)
00058         QDomNodeList nodeList = doc.childNodes();
00059         int i = 0;
00060         // search for the first element with children (=document type)
00061         while (!nodeList.at(i).hasChildNodes()) {
00062                 ++i;
00063         }
00064 
00065         QDomNodeList children = doc.childNodes().item(i).childNodes();
00066 
00067         // set the attributes
00068         setXMLNameSpaceAttributes(attributes_);
00069 
00070         for (int i = 0; i < children.size(); ++i) {
00071 
00072                 // dont parse comments
00073                 if (children.at(i).isComment()) {
00074                         continue;
00075                 }
00076 
00077                 // get busInterfaces
00078                 if (children.at(i).nodeName() == QString("spirit:busInterfaces")) {
00079                         // call constructors for all bus interfaces
00080                         for (int j = 0; j < children.at(i).childNodes().count(); ++j) {
00081 
00082                                 // call constructor and give the child node representing the
00083                                 // single choice as parameter
00084                                 QDomNode tempNode = children.at(i).childNodes().at(j);
00085 
00086                                 // dont parse comments
00087                                 if (!tempNode.isComment()) {
00088 
00089                                         // create the bus interface from the node.
00090                                         BusInterface* interface =
00091                                                         new BusInterface(tempNode);
00092 
00093                                         // add the pointer to the map
00094                                         busInterfaces_.insert(interface->getName(),
00095                                                         QSharedPointer<BusInterface>(interface));
00096                                 }
00097                         }
00098                 }
00099 
00100                 // get channels
00101                 else if (children.at(i).nodeName() == QString("spirit:channels")) {
00102 
00103                         // go through all the channel elements
00104                         for (int j = 0; j < children.at(i).childNodes().count(); ++j) {
00105 
00106                                 QDomNode channelNode = children.at(i).childNodes().at(j);
00107 
00108                                 // dont parse comments
00109                                 if (!channelNode.isComment()) {
00110                                         channels_.append(QSharedPointer<Channel>(
00111                                                         new Channel(channelNode)));
00112                                 }
00113                         }
00114                 }
00115 
00116                 // get remapStates
00117                 else if (children.at(i).nodeName() == QString("spirit:remapStates")) {
00118 
00119                         // go through all remap states
00120                         for (int j = 0; j < children.at(i).childNodes().count(); ++j) {
00121 
00122                                 QDomNode remapStateNode = children.at(i).childNodes().at(j);
00123 
00124                                 // dont parse comments
00125                                 if (!remapStateNode.isComment()) {
00126                                         remapStates_.append(QSharedPointer<RemapState>(
00127                                                         new RemapState(remapStateNode)));
00128                                 }
00129                         }
00130                 }
00131 
00132                 // get addressSpaces
00133                 else if (children.at(i).nodeName() == QString("spirit:addressSpaces")) {
00134 
00135                         // go through all the addressSpace elements
00136                         for (int j = 0; j < children.at(i).childNodes().count(); ++j) {
00137                                 QDomNode addrSpaceNode = children.at(i).childNodes().at(j);
00138 
00139                                 // don't parse comments
00140                                 if (!addrSpaceNode.isComment()) {
00141                                         addressSpaces_.append(QSharedPointer<AddressSpace>(
00142                                                         new AddressSpace(addrSpaceNode)));
00143                                 }
00144                         }
00145                 }
00146 
00147                 // get memoryMaps
00148                 else if (children.at(i).nodeName() == QString("spirit:memoryMaps")) {
00149 
00150                         // go through all the memory maps
00151                         for (int j = 0; j < children.at(i).childNodes().count(); ++j) {
00152                                 QDomNode memoryMapNode = children.at(i).childNodes().at(j);
00153 
00154                                 // don't parse comments
00155                                 if (!memoryMapNode.isComment()) {
00156                                         memoryMaps_.append(QSharedPointer<MemoryMap>(
00157                                                         new MemoryMap(memoryMapNode)));
00158                                 }
00159                         }
00160                 }
00161 
00162                 // get model
00163                 else if (children.at(i).nodeName() == QString("spirit:model")) {
00164                         QDomNode modelNode = children.at(i);
00165                         model_ = QSharedPointer<Model>(new Model(modelNode));
00166                 }
00167 
00168                 // get componentGenerators
00169                 else if (children.at(i).nodeName() ==
00170                                 QString("spirit:componentGenerators")) {
00171 
00172                         // call constructor for all component generators
00173                         for (int j = 0; j < children.at(i).childNodes().count(); ++j) {
00174 
00175                                 // call constructor and give the child node representing the
00176                                 // single componentGenerator as parameter
00177                                 QDomNode generatorNode = children.at(i).childNodes().at(j);
00178 
00179                                 // don't parse comments
00180                                 if (!generatorNode.isComment()) {
00181                                         compGenerators_.append(QSharedPointer<ComponentGenerator>(
00182                                                         new ComponentGenerator(generatorNode)));
00183                                 }
00184                         }
00185                 }
00186 
00187                 // get choices
00188                 else if (children.at(i).nodeName() == QString("spirit:choices")) {
00189 
00190                         // call constructors for all choices
00191                         for (int j = 0; j < children.at(i).childNodes().count(); ++j) {
00192 
00193                                 // call constructor and give the child node representing the
00194                                 // single choice as parameter
00195                                 QDomNode tempNode = children.at(i).childNodes().at(j);
00196 
00197                                 // don't parse comments
00198                                 if (!tempNode.isComment()) {
00199                                         choices_.append(QSharedPointer<Choice>(
00200                                                         new Choice(tempNode)));
00201                                 }
00202                         }
00203                 }
00204 
00205                 else if (children.at(i).nodeName() == QString("spirit:fileSets")) {
00206 
00207                         // call constructors for all file sets
00208                         for (int j = 0; j < children.at(i).childNodes().count(); ++j) {
00209 
00210                                 // call constructor and give the child node representing the
00211                                 // single file set as parameter
00212                                 QDomNode tempNode = children.at(i).childNodes().at(j);
00213 
00214                                 // don't parse comments
00215                                 if (!tempNode.isComment()) {
00216                                         fileSets_.append(QSharedPointer<FileSet>(
00217                                                         new FileSet(tempNode)));
00218                                 }
00219                         }
00220                 }
00221 
00222                 // get cpus
00223                 else if (children.at(i).nodeName() == QString("spirit:cpus")) {
00224 
00225                         // go through all cpus
00226                         for (int j = 0; j < children.at(i).childNodes().count(); ++j) {
00227                                 QDomNode cpuNode = children.at(i).childNodes().at(j);
00228 
00229                                 // don't parse comments
00230                                 if (!cpuNode.isComment()) {
00231                                         cpus_.append(QSharedPointer<Cpu>(
00232                                                         new Cpu(cpuNode)));
00233                                 }
00234                         }
00235                 }
00236 
00237                 // get otherClockDrivers
00238                 else if (children.at(i).nodeName() ==
00239                                 QString("spirit:otherClockDrivers")) {
00240 
00241                         // go through all otherClockDrivers
00242                         for (int j = 0; j < children.at(i).childNodes().count(); ++j) {
00243                                 QDomNode clockNode = children.at(i).childNodes().at(j);
00244 
00245                                 // don't parse comments
00246                                 if (!clockNode.isComment()) {
00247                                         otherClockDrivers_.append(QSharedPointer<OtherClockDriver>(
00248                                                         new OtherClockDriver(clockNode)));
00249                                 }
00250                         }
00251                 }
00252 
00253                 // get parameters
00254                 else if (children.at(i).nodeName() == QString("spirit:parameters")) {
00255                         // go through all parameters
00256                         for (int j = 0; j < children.at(i).childNodes().count(); ++j) {
00257 
00258                                 QDomNode parameterNode = children.at(i).childNodes().at(j);
00259 
00260                                 // don't parse comments
00261                                 if (!parameterNode.isComment()) {
00262                                         parameters_.append(QSharedPointer<Parameter>(
00263                                                         new Parameter(parameterNode)));
00264                                 }
00265                         }
00266                 }
00267 
00268                 // get vendor extensions
00269                 else if (children.at(i).nodeName() == QString("spirit:vendorExtensions")) {
00270                         for (int j = 0; j < children.at(i).childNodes().count(); ++j) {
00271                                 
00272                                 QDomNode extensionNode = children.at(i).childNodes().at(j);
00273 
00274                                 // if node is for kactus2 extensions
00275                                 if (extensionNode.nodeName() == QString("kactus2:extensions")) {
00276 
00277                                         for (int k = 0; k < extensionNode.childNodes().count(); ++k) {
00278                                                 
00279                                                 QDomNode kactusExtension = extensionNode.childNodes().at(k);
00280 
00281                                                 // if node is for kactus2 attributes
00282                                                 if (kactusExtension.nodeName() == QString("kactus2:kts_attributes")) {
00283                                                         parseKactus2Attributes(kactusExtension);
00284                                                 }
00285                                         }
00286                                 }
00287                         }
00288                 }
00289         }
00290         return;
00291 }

00445                 busInterfaces_.clear();

00574 void Component::write(QFile& file) {
00575         // create a writer instance and set it to operate on the given file
00576         QXmlStreamWriter writer(&file);
00577 
00578         // writer automatically adds whitespaces to make document more readable
00579         writer.setAutoFormatting(true);
00580         // writer uses one tab as indentation
00581         writer.setAutoFormattingIndent(-1);
00582 
00583         // call the base class implementation to write the top comment and
00584         // vlvn info. It also starts the type element (i.e <spirit:busDefinition>)
00585         LibraryComponent::write(writer);
00586 
00587         // set the attributes
00588         setXMLNameSpaceAttributes(attributes_);
00589 
00590         // write the attributes for the spirit:component element
00591         General::writeAttributes(writer, attributes_);
00592 
00593         // call base class to write the VLNV info
00594         LibraryComponent::writeVLNV(writer);
00595 
00596         if (busInterfaces_.size() != 0) {
00597                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:busInterfaces");
00598 
00599                 // write each busInterface
00600                 for (QMap<QString, QSharedPointer<BusInterface> >::iterator i =
00601                                 busInterfaces_.begin(); i != busInterfaces_.end(); ++i) {
00602 
00603                         i.value()->write(writer);
00604                 }
00605 
00606                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:busInterfaces
00607         }
00608 
00609         if (channels_.size() != 0) {
00610                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:channels");
00611 
00612                 // write each channel
00613                 for (int i = 0; i < channels_.size(); ++i) {
00614                         channels_.at(i)->write(writer);
00615                 }
00616 
00617                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:channels
00618         }
00619 
00620         if (remapStates_.size() != 0) {
00621                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:remapStates");
00622 
00623                 // write each remapState
00624                 for (int i = 0; i < remapStates_.size(); ++i) {
00625                         remapStates_.at(i)->write(writer);
00626                 }
00627 
00628                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:remapStates
00629         }
00630 
00631         if (addressSpaces_.size() != 0) {
00632                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:addressSpaces");
00633 
00634                 // write each addressSpace
00635                 for (int i = 0; i < addressSpaces_.size(); ++i) {
00636                         addressSpaces_.at(i)->write(writer);
00637                 }
00638 
00639                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:addressSpaces
00640         }
00641 
00642         if (memoryMaps_.size() != 0) {
00643                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:memoryMaps");
00644 
00645                 // write each memoryMap
00646                 for (int i = 0; i < memoryMaps_.size(); ++i) {
00647                         // each memorymap root element must be written outside of
00648                         // memoryMap::write() function
00649                         writer.writeStartElement("spirit:memoryMap");
00650                         memoryMaps_.at(i)->write(writer);
00651                         writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:memoryMap
00652                 }
00653 
00654                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:memoryMaps
00655         }
00656 
00657         if (model_) {
00658                 model_->write(writer);
00659         }
00660 
00661         if (compGenerators_.size() != 0) {
00662                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:componentGenerators");
00663 
00664                 // write each component generator
00665                 for (int i = 0; i < compGenerators_.size(); ++i) {
00666                         compGenerators_.at(i)->write(writer);
00667                 }
00668 
00669                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:componeneGenerators
00670         }
00671 
00672         if (choices_.size() != 0) {
00673                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:choices");
00674 
00675                 // write each choice
00676                 for (int i = 0; i < choices_.size(); ++i) {
00677                         choices_.at(i)->write(writer);
00678                 }
00679 
00680                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:choices
00681         }
00682 
00683         if (fileSets_.size() != 0) {
00684                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:fileSets");
00685 
00686                 // write each file set
00687                 for (int i = 0; i < fileSets_.size(); ++i) {
00688                         fileSets_.at(i)->write(writer);
00689                 }
00690 
00691                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:fileSets
00692         }
00693 
00694         if (cpus_.size() != 0) {
00695                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:cpus");
00696 
00697                 // write each cpus
00698                 for (int i = 0; i < cpus_.size(); ++i) {
00699                         cpus_.at(i)->write(writer);
00700                 }
00701 
00702                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:cpus
00703         }
00704 
00705         if (otherClockDrivers_.size() != 0) {
00706                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:otherClockDrivers");
00707 
00708                 // write each otherClockDriver
00709                 for (int i = 0; i < otherClockDrivers_.size(); ++i) {
00710                         otherClockDrivers_.at(i)->write(writer);
00711                 }
00712 
00713                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:otherClockDrivers
00714         }
00715 
00716         // if description is specified in the base class
00717         if (!LibraryComponent::description_.isEmpty()) {
00718                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:description", description_);
00719         }
00720 
00721         if (parameters_.size() != 0) {
00722                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:parameters");
00723 
00724                 // write each parameter
00725                 for (int i = 0; i < parameters_.size(); ++i) {
00726                         parameters_.at(i)->write(writer);
00727                 }
00728 
00729                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:parameters
00730         }
00731 
00732         // if contains kactus2 attributes
00733         if (!kactus2Attributes_.isEmpty()) {
00734                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:vendorExtensions");
00735                 writer.writeStartElement("kactus2:extensions");
00736                 
00737                 writeKactus2Attributes(writer);
00738 
00739                 writer.writeEndElement(); // kactus2:extensions
00740                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:vendorExtensions
00741         }
00742 
00743         writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:component
00744         writer.writeEndDocument();
00745         return;
00746 
00747 }
00748 
00749 // get the attributes
00750 const QMap<QString, QString>& Component::getAttributes() const {
00751         return attributes_;
00752 }
00753

00755 void Component::setAttributes(const QMap<QString, QString>& attributes) {
00756         attributes_ = attributes;
00757 }

00759 Model *Component::getModel() {
00760         
00761         // if model is defined for this component
00762         if (model_)
00763                 return model_.data();
00764         
00765         // if model is not defined then create an empty model and return pointer to
00766         // it
00767         else {
00768                 model_ = QSharedPointer<Model>(new Model());
00769                 return model_.data();
00770         }
00771 }

00920 
00921 const QList<VLNV> Component::getDependentVLNVs() const {
00922         QList<VLNV> vlnvList;
00923 
00924         // search all bus interfaces
00925         for (QMap<QString, QSharedPointer<BusInterface> >::const_iterator i =
00926                         busInterfaces_.begin(); i != busInterfaces_.end(); ++i) {
00927 
00928                 // if abstraction type is defined
00929                 if (i.value()->getAbstractionType().isValid()) {
00930                         vlnvList.append(i.value()->getAbstractionType());
00931                 }
00932                 // if bus type is defined
00933                 if (i.value()->getBusType().isValid()) {
00934                         vlnvList.append(i.value()->getBusType());
00935                 }
00936         }
00937 
00938         // ask model for all hierarchyrefs
00939         if (model_)
00940                 vlnvList += model_->getHierarchyRefs();
00941 
00942         return vlnvList;
00943 }
00944 
00945 const QStringList Component::getDependentFiles() const {
00946         QStringList files;
00947 
00948         // find the file sets
00949         for (int i = 0; i < fileSets_.size(); ++i) {
00950                 files += fileSets_.at(i)->getFilePaths();
00951         }
00952 
00953         // find the component generators
00954         for (int i = 0; i < compGenerators_.size(); ++i) {
00955                 files += compGenerators_.at(i)->getGeneratorExe();
00956         }
00957         return files;
00958 }
00959 
00960 BusInterface* Component::getBusInterface(const QString& name) {
00961

00963         if (busInterfaces_.contains(name)) {
00964                 return busInterfaces_.value(name).data();
00965         }
00966 
00967         // if named bus interface couldn't be found
00968         return 0;
00969 }

00971 QList<General::LibraryFilePair> Component::getVhdlLibraries() const {
00972         QList<General::LibraryFilePair> libraries;
00973 
00974         // take libraries from all file sets
00975         for (int i = 0; i < fileSets_.size(); ++i) {
00976                 libraries += fileSets_.at(i)->getVhdlLibraries();
00977         }
00978 
00979         return libraries;
00980 }
00981 
00982 QStringList Component::getVhdlLibraries( const QString& viewName ) const {
00983 
00984         QStringList fileSetNames;
00985 
00986         // if view was specified
00987         if (!viewName.isEmpty()) {
00988 
00989                 // if theres no views
00990                 if (!model_) {
00991                         return QStringList();
00992                 }
00993 
00994                 // get the names of the file sets that are used.
00995                 fileSetNames = model_->getFileSetRefs(viewName);
00996         }
00997         // view was not specified so take all file sets
00998         else {
00999                 foreach (QSharedPointer<FileSet> fileSet, fileSets_) {
01000                         fileSetNames.append(fileSet->getName());
01001                 }
01002         }
01003 
01004         QStringList libraries;
01005         // each file set referenced by the view
01006         foreach (QString fileSetName, fileSetNames) {
01007 
01008                 foreach (QSharedPointer<FileSet> fileSet, fileSets_) {
01009                         
01010                         // if file set is the searched one
01011                         if (fileSet->getName() == fileSetName) {
01012                                 libraries += fileSet->getVhdlLibraryNames();
01013                         }
01014                 }
01015         }
01016         libraries.removeDuplicates();
01017         return libraries;
01018 }
01019 
01020 QList<General::LibraryFilePair> Component::getLibraries( const QString& viewName ) const {
01021 
01022         QList<General::LibraryFilePair> libraries;
01023         // if no model then there are no views.
01024         if (!model_)
01025                 return libraries;
01026 
01027         // ask the model for references to file sets.
01028         QStringList fileSets = model_->getFileSetRefs(viewName);
01029         foreach (QString fileSetName, fileSets) {
01030 
01031                 // find the matching file set
01032                 foreach (QSharedPointer<FileSet> fileSet, fileSets_) {
01033                         if (fileSet->getName() == fileSetName) {
01034                                 libraries += fileSet->getVerilogLibraries();
01035                                 libraries += fileSet->getVhdlLibraries();
01036                         }
01037                 }
01038         }
01039         return libraries;
01040 }
01041 
01042 QList<General::LibraryFilePair> Component::getVerilogLibraries() const {
01043         QList<General::LibraryFilePair> libraries;
01044 
01045         // take libraries from all file sets
01046         for (int i = 0; i < fileSets_.size(); ++i) {
01047                 libraries += fileSets_.at(i)->getVerilogLibraries();
01048         }
01049 
01050         return libraries;
01051 }
01052 
01053 bool Component::isCpu() const {
01054         if (cpus_.size() != 0) {
01055                 return true;
01056         }
01057         return false;
01058 }
01059 
01060 
01061 bool Component::isBus() const {
01062 
01063         // if there is channels this is bus component
01064         if (channels_.size() != 0 ) {
01065                 return true;
01066         }
01067 
01068         // if bridge is found in one of the bus interfaces this is bus component
01069         for (QMap<QString, QSharedPointer<BusInterface> >::const_iterator i =
01070                         busInterfaces_.begin(); i != busInterfaces_.end(); ++i) {
01071 
01072                 // if one of the bus interfaces has a bridge, this is bus component
01073                 if (i.value()->hasBridge()) {
01074                         return true;
01075                 }
01076         }
01077 
01078         // if no channel or bridge was found
01079         return false;
01080 }
01081 
01082 bool Component::isChannel() const {
01083         return !channels_.isEmpty();
01084 }
01085 
01086 bool Component::isBridge() const {
01087         
01088         // search all bus interfaces.
01089         foreach (QSharedPointer<BusInterface> busif, busInterfaces_) {
01090 
01091                 // if one bridge is found
01092                 if (busif->hasBridge())
01093                         return true;
01094         }
01095         // not a single bridge was found
01096         return false;
01097 }
01098 
01099 
01100 bool Component::isHierarchical() const {
01101 
01102         // if no model element is defined then there is no hierarchical view
01103         if (!model_)
01104                 return false;
01105 
01106         // if the model-element has atleast one hierachical view defined
01107         return model_->hasHierView();
01108 }

01175                 // if the file set is the specified one

01177                         fileSets_.value(i).clear();
01178                         fileSets_.removeAt(i);
01179                         return;
01180                 }
01181         }

01218 bool Component::addBusInterface(QSharedPointer<BusInterface> busInterface ) {
01219 
01220         if (busInterfaces_.contains(busInterface->getName()))
01221                 return false;
01222 
01223         busInterfaces_.insert(busInterface->getName(), busInterface);
01224         return true;
01225 }
01226 
01227 void Component::removeBusInterface( const QString& busifName ) {
01228 
01229         busInterfaces_.remove(busifName);
01230 }
01231 
01232 void Component::removeBusInterface( const BusInterface* busInterface ) {
01233         // get all bus interface pointers
01234         QList<QSharedPointer<BusInterface> > list = busInterfaces_.values();
01235         // and check if any matches with given bus interface
01236         foreach (QSharedPointer<BusInterface> busif, list) {
01237 
01238                 // if they match
01239                 if (busif.data() == busInterface) {
01240 
01241                         // remove the old item in the map
01242                         busInterfaces_.remove(busif->getName());
01243                         continue;
01244                 }
01245         }
01246 }

01255 QStringList Component::getBusInterfaceNames() const {

01259                 list.append(busif->getName());
01260         }
01261         return list;

01263 
01264 void Component::updateBusInterface(BusInterface* busInterface ) {
01265 
01266         // get all bus interface pointers
01267         QList<QSharedPointer<BusInterface> > list = busInterfaces_.values();
01268         // and check if any matches with given bus interface
01269         foreach (QSharedPointer<BusInterface> busif, list) {
01270 
01271                 // if they match
01272                 if (busif.data() == busInterface) {
01273 
01274                         // remove the old item in the map
01275                         busInterfaces_.take(busInterfaces_.key(busif)/*busif->getName()*/);
01276 
01277                         // update the name
01278                         busif->setName(busInterface->getName());
01279 
01280                         // add new item to the map 
01281                         busInterfaces_.insert(busif->getName(), busif);
01282 
01283                         return;
01284                 }
01285         }
01286 
01287         // if no match was found, add the bus interface to the map
01288         busInterfaces_.insert(busInterface->getName(), 
01289                 QSharedPointer<BusInterface>(busInterface));
01290 }
01291 
01292 BusInterface* Component::createBusInterface() {
01293 
01294         BusInterface* busif = new BusInterface();
01295 
01296         // there might another bus interface with no name so must use insertMulti
01297         busInterfaces_.insertMulti(busif->getName(), QSharedPointer<BusInterface>(busif));
01298         return busif;
01299 }

01373 void Component::removeChannel( const QString& channelName ) {

01381 
01382 void Component::updateFiles( const Component& other,
01383                                                         const QString& sourcePath, 
01384                                                         const QString& targetPath ) {
01385                                 
01386         Q_ASSERT_X(!sourcePath.isEmpty(), "Component::updateFiles",
01387                 "Empty source path given as parameter");
01388         Q_ASSERT_X(!targetPath.isEmpty(), "Component::updateFiles",
01389                 "Empty targetPath given as parameter");
01390 
01391         // can't operate on the same component
01392         if (&other == this)
01393                 return;
01394 
01395         // get the files from the other component
01396         QStringList files = other.getFiles();
01397         
01398         // take each file
01399         foreach (QString file, files) {
01400         
01401                 // get the absolute path to the file
01402                 QDir source(sourcePath);
01403                 QString absoluteSource = source.absoluteFilePath(file);
01404 
01405                 // if file is located under the source directory
01406                 if (!file.contains(QString("../"))) {
01407 
01408                         QDir target(targetPath);
01409                         QString absoluteTarget = target.absoluteFilePath(file);
01410                         
01411                         QFileInfo targetInfo(absoluteTarget);
01412 
01413                         target.mkpath(targetInfo.absolutePath());
01414                         QFile::copy(absoluteSource, absoluteTarget);
01415                          
01416                 }
01417                 // if file is higher in directory hierarchy than the source directory
01418                 else {
01419                         // update the file name
01420                         changeFileName(file, absoluteSource);
01421                 }
01422         }
01423 }
01424 
01425 void Component::changeFileName( const QString& from, const QString& to ) {
01426 
01427         foreach (QSharedPointer<FileSet> fileSet, fileSets_) {
01428 
01429                 if (fileSet->contains(from)) {
01430                         fileSet->changeFileName(from, to);
01431                         return;
01432                 }
01433         }
01434 }
01435 
01436 File* Component::getQuartusPinmap() const {
01437 
01438         foreach (QSharedPointer<FileSet> fileSet, fileSets_) {
01439                 File* file = fileSet->getQuartusPinMap();
01440                 if (file)
01441                         return file;
01442         }
01443 
01444         // no pin map was found
01445         return 0;
01446 }
01447 
01448 void Component::setVlnv( const VLNV& vlnv ) {
01449         LibraryComponent::setVlnv(vlnv);
01450         LibraryComponent::vlnv_->setType(VLNV::COMPONENT);
01451 }
01452 
01453 KactusAttribute::ProductHierarchy Component::getComponentHierarchy() const {
01454 
01455         KactusAttribute::ProductHierarchy hierarchy = KactusAttribute::KTS_GLOBAL;
01456 
01457         // if attribute is not found
01458         if (!kactus2Attributes_.contains(QString("kts_productHier")))
01459                 return hierarchy;
01460         else
01461                 KactusAttribute::stringToValue(kactus2Attributes_.value(QString("kts_productHier")),
01462                 hierarchy);
01463 
01464         return hierarchy;
01465 }
01466 
01467 KactusAttribute::Firmness Component::getComponentFirmness() const {
01468         KactusAttribute::Firmness firmness = KactusAttribute::KTS_MUTABLE;
01469 
01470         if (!kactus2Attributes_.contains(QString("kts_firmness")))
01471                 return firmness;
01472         else
01473                 KactusAttribute::stringToValue(kactus2Attributes_.value(QString("kts_firmness")),
01474                 firmness);
01475         return firmness;
01476 }
01477 
01478 KactusAttribute::Implementation Component::getComponentImplementation() const {
01479         KactusAttribute::Implementation implementation = KactusAttribute::KTS_HW;
01480 
01481         if (!kactus2Attributes_.contains(QString("kts_implementation")))
01482                 return implementation;
01483         else
01484                 KactusAttribute::stringToValue(kactus2Attributes_.value(QString("kts_implementation")),
01485                 implementation);
01486         return implementation;
01487 }

01490 // Function: getComponentSWType()
01491 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01492 KactusAttribute::SWType Component::getComponentSWType() const
01493 {
01494         KactusAttribute::SWType type = KactusAttribute::KTS_SW_MAPPING;
01495 
01496         if (kactus2Attributes_.contains(QString("kts_sw_type"))) {
01497                 KactusAttribute::stringToValue(kactus2Attributes_.value(QString("kts_sw_type")), type);
01498         }
01499 
01500         return type;
01501 }

01566 const QMap<QString, QSharedPointer<Port> > Component::getPorts() const {
01567         if (model_)
01568                 return model_->getPorts();
01569         else
01570                 return QMap<QString, QSharedPointer<Port> >();
01571 }
01572 
01573 const QMap<QString, QSharedPointer<Port> > Component::getPorts( const QString& interfaceName ) const {
01574 
01575         QMap<QString, QSharedPointer<Port> > ports;
01576         
01577         // if interface is not found
01578         if (!busInterfaces_.contains(interfaceName)) {
01579                 return ports;
01580         }
01581 
01582         // get list of ports in the interface
01583         QStringList portNames = busInterfaces_.value(interfaceName)->getPhysicalPortNames();
01584 
01585         // get all the ports on the component
01586         ports = getPorts();
01587 
01588         QMap<QString, QSharedPointer<Port> > portsToReturn;
01589 
01590         // check each port
01591         for (QMap<QString, QSharedPointer<Port> >::iterator i = ports.begin();
01592                 i != ports.end(); ++i) {
01593 
01594                         // if the port is on this interface
01595                         if (portNames.contains(i.key())) {
01596                                 
01597                                 // copy the port to the list to be returned
01598                                 portsToReturn.insert(i.key(), i.value());
01599                         }
01600         }
01601         return portsToReturn;
01602 }
01603 
01604 bool Component::hasFile( const QString& fileName ) const {
01605         foreach (QSharedPointer<FileSet> fileSet, fileSets_) {
01606                 if (fileSet->contains(fileName)) {
01607                         return true;
01608                 }
01609         }
01610         return false;
01611 }

01715 QString Component::getEntityName( const QString& viewName ) const {
01716         QString entityName;
01717         if (model_) {
01718                 entityName = model_->getEntityName(viewName);
01719 
01720                 // if view contained an entity name
01721                 if (!entityName.isEmpty()) {
01722                         return entityName;
01723                 }
01724         
01725         }
01726         // if there are no views then the VLNV name is used
01727         entityName = vlnv_->getName();
01728         entityName = entityName.remove(QString(".comp"), Qt::CaseInsensitive);
01729         return entityName;
01730 }

01785 
01786 QMultiMap<QString, VLNV> Component::getInterfaceAbsDefForPort( const QString& physicalPortName ) const {
01787         QMultiMap<QString, VLNV> absDefList;
01788         foreach (QSharedPointer<BusInterface> busif, busInterfaces_) {
01789                 // if the interface contains the physical port
01790                 if (busif->hasPhysicalPort(physicalPortName)) {
01791                         
01792                         QString logicalPort = busif->getLogicalPortName(physicalPortName);
01793 
01794                         if (!logicalPort.isEmpty()) {
01795                                 absDefList.insert(logicalPort, busif->getAbstractionType());
01796                         }
01797                 }
01798         }
01799         return absDefList;
01800 }
01801 
01802 QString Component::getInterfaceNameForPort( const QString& portName ) const {
01803         bool found = false;
01804         QString interfaceName = "none";
01805 
01806         // search all ports
01807         foreach (QSharedPointer<BusInterface> busif, busInterfaces_) {
01808                 
01809                 // if the interface contains the port
01810                 if (busif->hasPhysicalPort(portName)) {
01811 
01812                         // if the port was found before then there are many interfaces for this port
01813                         if (found) {
01814                                 interfaceName = "several";
01815                         }
01816                         // mark port as found and set the interface name
01817                         else {
01818                                 found = true;
01819                                 interfaceName = busif->getName();
01820                         }
01821                 }
01822         }
01823         return interfaceName;
01824 }
01825 
01826 QString Component::getInterfaceDescription( const QString& interfaceName ) const {
01827         if (busInterfaces_.contains(interfaceName)) {
01828                 return busInterfaces_.value(interfaceName)->getDescription();
01829         }
01830         else {
01831                 return QString();
01832         }
01833 }
01834 
01835 void Component::createEmptyFlatView() {
01836         // create new view
01837         View* newView = new View();
01838 
01839         // depending on the hierarchy level select the name for the view
01840         KactusAttribute::ProductHierarchy hier = getComponentHierarchy();
01841         switch (hier) 
01842         {
01843         case KactusAttribute::KTS_IP:
01844         case KactusAttribute::KTS_SOC: {
01845                 // set the name
01846                 newView->setName("rtl");
01847                 break;
01848                                                                    }
01849         default: {
01850                 newView->setName("flat");
01851                 break;
01852                          }
01853         }
01854 
01855         newView->addEnvIdentifier(QString("::"));
01856 
01857         // if model has not yet been created
01858         if (!model_) {
01859                 model_ = QSharedPointer<Model>(new Model());
01860         }
01861         model_->addView(newView);
01862 }
01863 
01864 void Component::createHierarchicalView( const VLNV& hierRef ) {
01865         // create new view
01866         View* newView = new View();
01867 
01868         // depending on the hierarchy level select the name for the view
01869         KactusAttribute::ProductHierarchy hier = getComponentHierarchy();
01870         switch (hier) 
01871         {
01872         case KactusAttribute::KTS_IP:
01873         case KactusAttribute::KTS_SOC: {
01874                 // set the name
01875                 newView->setName("structural");
01876                 break;
01877                                                                    }
01878         default: {
01879                 newView->setName("hierarchical");
01880                 break;
01881                          }
01882         }
01883 
01884         newView->addEnvIdentifier(QString("::"));
01885         newView->setHierarchyRef(hierRef);
01886 
01887         // if model has not yet been created
01888         if (!model_) {
01889                 model_ = QSharedPointer<Model>(new Model());
01890         }
01891 
01892         model_->addView(newView);
01893 }
